data.name: Lustful Pussies
data.detailed_description:
In Lustful Pussies, you play in third person as John, who has fallen asleep and is dreaming. In this dream, he is the hero of a real action movie! He has to take the Dildo Gun and shoot back from the crowds of excited women who want to beat and fuck William.

Lustful Pussies is a third-person shooter where you have to shoot at horny women with a real Dildo Gun. Be especially vigilant! William has only one life. Fuck horny girls with dildos that your Dildo Gun fires. Get unreal pleasure from the gameplay and eye-pleasing graphics!

Game Features:
Fun music and cool atmosphere!
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Lots of beautiful naked girls!
Very beautiful graphics!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 6XXX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 6XXX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.
